title: Team Dismay Looking for a Solid LoL team Diamond +
body:
Team Dismay is a new eSports organisation looking for players that can compete at a high level. We are a bunch of committed and loyal nerds who can play the game at a competitive level. I also offer full funding to the essentials needed for the team to help my players strive to be the best they can, this includes a Teamspeak server, Player Jerseys when we get better.

If you wanted to contact me add me on Steam or you can comment your LoL name and i will add you.

replies.body:
if this is legit then my team wouldn't mind combining organisations we are all diamond+ 
add me and we can talk more about this
IGN - Aspire Nubzy
Hey man can you add N 4 on league, just posting on this account which is my smurf, id be interested in trialing for Top lane.
